main event: A witness observed an unidentified object in the sky for approximately 2-3 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared to revolve and climbed steadily to the east., The object was reported as an air vehicle and no matching aircraft was seen., The object climbed at a consistent speed before making sudden turns., Multiple sightings were reported in a short period., The sighting was described as a radar object, 112 ft in diameter, making a sudden 90-degree turn to the northeast.
